name: How about a wildlife tour to Chitwan?
description: Our wildlife trip to Chitwan will take us to the core area of the Chitwan National Park to enjoy its wilderness. The highlights of this trip are visiting to the park that is habitat for the 500 Asian one-horned rhinoceros and some hundred nocturnal Royal Bengal tigers. We can also enjoy the trip with various jungle activities such as Jungle safari, elephant ride, bird watching, visit to elephant breeding center, etc. We can also enjoy the elephant bath, a canoe trip to watch alligators and mugger crocodile.
